title: Is This Girl….?
detail_text: <:th_ch0009/>Come with Nico today, Ayumu!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>O-, okay!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Kasumi talks a lot about you, Ayumu. Like how you have a lot going on but you will never lose or something like that. Nico wants to know why she’s so obsessed with you. So today, Nico is going to uncover your secrets!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Eeh!? I-, I don’t have any big secrets!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>That’s what someone who’s hiding something would say~.... Nico is an expert, so….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>I really don’t…. Rather than about me, I want to know more about your secrets, Nico-san….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Hmm. Well, Nico is a school idol that’s shrouded in mystery!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Even though you’re shorter than me, you look so big on the stage, and I can’t help but to look at you. It’s like you have a hidden pull. Or is that part of your secret!? I’m really interested in it! Please let me hear your story, Nico-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>You…. understand pretty well, huh! Okay then! Nico will tell you all about her today!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Yes! I’m looking forward to it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
